Html:
I love this plug in!  This is my first time playing with jQuery and I got it to work!  Thank you so much!

Now... I still need to apply it.  I need to add a comment box and collect the info, preferrably sending the results by email.

http://www.bspgc.com/Survey1.html

Thanks again for this awesome plug in!

Shel

Hi Shel,

I'm happy you got it to work. The rateit plugin is client side only. So the handling of a comment box, and collecting the information is out of its scope.

Perhaps head over to stackoverflow.com with specific questions.

Gidon
